resource.description: An AWS Support App resource that creates, updates, lists and deletes Slack channel configurations.

properties.name: TeamId
properties.description: The team ID in Slack, which uniquely identifies a workspace.

type.description: The team ID in Slack, which uniquely identifies a workspace.

properties.name: ChannelId
properties.description: The channel ID in Slack, which identifies a channel within a workspace.

type.description: The channel ID in Slack, which identifies a channel within a workspace.

properties.name: NotifyOnCreateOrReopenCase
properties.description: Whether to notify when a case is created or reopened.

type.description: Whether to notify when a case is created or reopened.

properties.name: NotifyOnAddCorrespondenceToCase
properties.description: Whether to notify when a correspondence is added to a case.

type.description: Whether to notify when a correspondence is added to a case.

properties.name: NotifyOnResolveCase
properties.description: Whether to notify when a case is resolved.

type.description: Whether to notify when a case is resolved.

properties.name: NotifyOnCaseSeverity
properties.description: The severity level of a support case that a customer wants to get notified for.

type.description: The severity level of a support case that a customer wants to get notified for.

properties.name: ChannelRoleArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS Support App access to perform operations for AWS services.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS Support App access to perform operations for AWS services.
